ideas.title: AgentKey Vault
ideas.description: A self-custody vault for AI agents that allows them to 'allow-list' specific RPC methods and fund their own API keys autonomously using the Helius CLI pattern.
ideas.tech_stack: Anchor, Helius API, Rust-based Agent SDK
ideas.target_user: AI agent developers building autonomous trading bots or monitoring systems
ideas.feasibility: High. Helius already enabled the CLI fund-raising for agents; this just needs a secure UI/Vault layer.

ideas.title: Sentinel Agent Marketplace
ideas.description: A marketplace where users rent 'Sentinel Agents' to monitor DeFi positions 24/7 and execute defensive swaps or liquidations autonomously based on pre-set logic.
ideas.tech_stack: Solana SDK, Python (Agent Logic), Jupiter API
ideas.target_user: DeFi power users managing multiple positions across protocols who need 24/7 monitoring
ideas.feasibility: Medium. Requires robust automation infrastructure but fits the current trend of 'agent-on-behalf-of-user'.

ideas.title: Agent Micro-Payment Rail
ideas.description: A protocol using SPL Token-2022 Transfer Hooks to enable automated, granular payments between AI bots for specialized tasks (e.g., data fetching, compute sharing).
ideas.target_user: AI infrastructure providers building agent-to-agent marketplaces for compute/data services
ideas.feasibility: High. Leverages the native programmability of Solana's new token standard.

ideas.title: Mint-X: Compressed NFT Engine
ideas.description: A mass-minting tool for brands to issue millions of compressed NFTs or loyalty tokens at 99% lower cost than standard accounts via Light Protocol.
ideas.target_user: E-commerce brands, gaming studios, and loyalty programs needing mass NFT distribution
ideas.feasibility: High. The infra is live; the ecosystem just needs user-friendly tooling for non-technical brands.

ideas.title: ZK-Identity Registry
ideas.description: A privacy-preserving identity registry where user data is stored in compressed state, allowing for private on-chain verification via SNARK proofs.
ideas.target_user: DeFi protocols requiring KYC/compliance without exposing user data on-chain
ideas.feasibility: Medium. Technical barrier is higher but the ROI on privacy is massive in 2026.

ideas.title: Compressed On-Chain DB
ideas.description: A developer tool providing a 'SQL-like' interface for Solana app data, where the tables are stored entirely in ZK-compressed state.
ideas.target_user: dApp developers building data-heavy applications (social, gaming, marketplaces)
ideas.feasibility: High. Solves the 'storage cost' problem for complex dApp backends.

ideas.title: SVM Game State Rollup
ideas.description: A specialized SVM rollup optimized for sub-second game state updates (e.g., loot drops, move logs) that settles rare assets to Solana L1.
ideas.target_user: Web3 game developers building high-frequency multiplayer games with tradable assets
ideas.feasibility: Medium. Requires working with specialized SVM layers like Sonic or SOON.

ideas.title: RWA Institutional SVM
ideas.description: A pluggable SVM layer for Real-World Assets that implements KYC-gatekeepers at the instruction level for regulatory compliance.
ideas.target_user: TradFi institutions and asset managers tokenizing real-world assets on-chain
ideas.feasibility: Medium. Capitalizes on the trend of 'SVM as a pluggable execution layer'.

ideas.title: Yellowstone Explorer
ideas.description: A high-speed cross-SVM bridge and explorer that uses Yellowstone gRPC to monitor activity across multiple SVM rollups in real-time.
ideas.target_user: Cross-chain traders, SVM developers, and ecosystem teams tracking multi-rollup activity
ideas.feasibility: High. Critical infrastructure for the growing multi-SVM landscape.
